channel.title: Use with OS SDK API on OSSTD doc
channel.description: Recent content in Use with OS SDK API on OSSTD doc

item.title: Installation
item.description: A. Steps to install and get the OpenStudio PRM running for scripting with OpenStudio API There are 4 parts to this section. Download Ruby Download OpenStudio Connect Ruby with OpenStudio Download OpenStudio Standard 1. Download Ruby Download Ruby 2.7.x. Latest stable version is 2.7.2 and it can be downloaded at https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/news/2020/10/02/ruby-2-7-2-released/. You can also verify the ruby installation with the following command in the command line: C:\Users\sample_user>ruby -v ruby 2.

item.title: Call measure via API
item.description: B. Here is a quick overview of calling the measure via the API method The steps that generate baseline model(s) from a provided openstudio model are as follows: Create stable baseline building API User data Baseline outputs 1. Create stable baseline building API The ASHRAE 90.1-2019 PRM automation can be called in a Ruby script via its API method create a baseline model from a proposed model. The API method provides great flexibility for creating customized modeling workflow.
